item.title: Narrative and Space: Reconstruction of South China Historical Trail Heritage Network叙事与空间—南粤古驿道遗产网络构建研究
item.description: LI Mengran, ZHENG Tong, TANG Chuqiao, LIU Longying, SU Yanni, LIANG Xiyue, LI Hui 李梦然 1 ，郑 潼 2 ，汤楚乔 3 ，刘龙英 4 ，苏燕妮 5 ，梁浠玥 6，李 晖 7 ABSTRACT Nanyue Ancient Path is the communication route between Lingnan and foreign regions, and has existed across periods throughout history. item.title: Continuation - Conceptual urban design of Baie-Tan Area based on the theory of Urban Amenity循·续——基于城市舒适物理论的白鹅潭片区概念性城市设计
item.description: 作者：温凡、潘启枝、张莹、郑潼 分工情况：负责前期分析、部分分析图及效果图绘制，以及鸟瞰图 介绍：针对片区面临的文脉断裂及人性视角缺失的矛盾，引入“城市舒适物”（ Urban Amenity）理论，从片区中萃取舒适物元素，并从舒适物的五个层面架构片区舒适物网，串联起不同的舒适物及植入的新型舒适物，形成一个具有配套性和系统性的城市舒适运作体系。 将城市舒适物作为人的一系列不同活动和感知的整合结果,在城市设计过程中对舒适物进行应用,从人的需求方面去考虑城市更新,充分利用城市原有要素价值、延续人们对城市生活的感知记忆，在增强地方吸引力的同时保护当地居民的归属感和文化认同感。 2021年第一届智慧城市人居环境设计原创作品展 入围奖

item.description: （第十六届“挑战杯”广东大学生课外学术科技作品竞赛特等奖） 作者： 蔡健婷，李钰涵，郑琪，刘德义，林韵茹，何美慧，胡潮林，郑欣柱，郑潼，粱浠玥 分工情况： 撰写保安村文化治理困境一章，整理作品附录 （由于篇幅问题，仅展示部分撰写内容） Abstract China’s rural areas are in the transition period from “rural society” to “post-rural society”, and cultural governance is the countryside. The key to the breakthrough of village development. How to absorb the wisdom of rural cultural governance and find the endogenous driving force of rural cultural development, Exploring the experience of rural cultural governance is an important issue that needs to be solved at present.

item.title: Making the Garden More "Social": An Exploration of NGO Interventional Community Garden Maintenance Mode from the Perspective of Informal Public Participation让花园多点"社"——非正式公众参与视角下NGO介入型社区花园维运模式探究
item.description: 作者：梁浠玥、张莹、郑欣柱、郑潼 分工情况：负责部分前期分析，以及两种维运模式绘制 Abstract: Community garden is a public activity green space where community residents jointly engage in horticultural planting activities on community green space, and the planting process and results have public participation and sharing. Based on the perspective of informal public participation, through interviews, questionnaires and other methods, the cases, public needs and advocate concepts were understood in the early stage, and two representative community gardens in Guangzhou were selected as the research objects in the medium term, and their maintenance modes and public feedback were analyzed and compared, and then governance strategies conducive to the sustainable development of community gardens and enhanced the sense of participation of community residents were proposed, and the future construction and governance direction of community gardens in Guangzhou was explored.

item.title: Belief Space Features and Renewal Strategies of Jieyang Ancient City揭阳古城信仰空间特征及更新策略
item.description: 作者：郑潼 分工情况：独立完成 Abstract Spiritual spaces play an important role as communal spaces in everyday life. They are important carriers of historical, cultural, and community relations in the ancient city as well as a focal point for the revitalization of the city. Throughout its long history of urban development, the ancient area of Jieyang City has served not only as a geographical space, but also as a spiritual space, creating and preserving a legacy of human creativity.

item.title: Analysis of Informal Rest Space Behavior and Transformation Strategy of Streets: A Case Study of Wushan Street, Guangzhou街道非正式休憩空间行为分析及改造策略——以广州市五山街道为例
item.description: 作者：邓云心、刘彤、梁浠玥、张莹、郑潼 分工情况：负责问卷发放，调研概况撰写以及部分策略提出 Abstract: Taking Wushan Street in Tianhe District as a case study, this paper conducts an empirical study on the development of informal leisure space on streets, analyzes the characteristics of crowds and the spatial characteristics corresponding to daily activities on the street, analyzes the identification of multiple needs from the perspective of “informality”, discusses the factors of the formation of informal space in streets, analyzes the spatial operation mechanism, explores the blind areas of current planning policy response, and puts forward specific suggestions for the renewal strategy and governance methods of such space.
